queries.variant: undead medium creature that thrives in darkness and uses necrotic energy

queries.variant: monster with a greataxe and lawful evil alignment, also has a rejuvenation ability

queries.variant: undead that has a disorienting gaze and is sensitive to sunlight, famous for its trickery
